net.bican.wordpress
Class Wordpress

java.lang.Object
  net.bican.wordpress.Wordpress

public class Wordpress
extends Object

The utility class that links xmlrpc calls to Java functions.

Author:
Can Bican <can@bican.net>

MalformedURLException - If the URL is faulty
